The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Punch/Manterror/Injector/Double Punch:



Punch raised his weapon, approaching the Ark.  He saw the Oblitercons,  
jumping to the side, he avoided being trampled.  A voice cried several 
moments later.

"Hey, Punch is it?  The Alliance is retreating!  Get back to base, quick!  
Before them Maxis hunt us down!"

Punch looked up, seeing Nemesis Enforcer flying away in his large bat mode.  
Seeing Zardus following soon, he continued to hop, though towards the 
Alliance base, the same slagging place he had just come from.

===

Manterror, Injector, and Double Punch, saw from a cliff the Maximals and the 
Ark.  Activating the com, Double Punch spoke.  

<Hell Beast, it's Double Punch.  I'm looking at the Ark, and it is slagged.  
The Maximals are looking like they're all going to fall over and die.  It'll 
take them a few weeks to repair this!  All the raw materials needed.  They'd 
need an alliance!  Maybe they're gonna ally with the Alliance?  What are your 
orders?  Shall Manterror, Injector, and myself stay here and spy, or do you 
need us for something else, Hell Beast?>
